headline: US STD Diagnostics Market Forecast and Company Analysis 2025-2033 Featuring Abbott, F. Hoffmann-La Roche, Hologic, BD and Co, Danaher, Siemens, bioMerieux, Thermo Fisher Scientific, Qiagen, Bio-Rad
summary: The United States STD Diagnostics Market is set to grow from US$ 5.06 billion in 2024 to US$ 8.49 billion by 2033, achieving a CAGR of 5.91% from 2025 to 2033. Key growth drivers include rising STD prevalence, technological advancements, increased awareness, and supportive government initiatives. Rapid point-of-care tests and molecular diagnostics are gaining traction, while high costs and regulatory hurdles persist as challenges. Major markets like California, Texas, New York, and Florida lead
